post.title: Cover Corp. CEO Yagoo Makes Guest Appearance at CRX 2022
post.content:
Cover Corp. CEO Motoaki Tanigo, known as ‚ÄúYAGOO‚Äù to his many fans and followers, made a surprise appearance at Crunchyroll Expo 2022, a recent event that ran from August 5 - 7. While YAGOO had no planned events or appearances, he certainly drew crowds and cheers as he toured the event while wearing a Magni Dezmond shirt and met with different VTubers.

It‚Äôs maggin‚Äô time!#CRX2022 pic.twitter.com/NZS1FdLfsC

— YAGOO / Motoaki Tanigo (@tanigox) August 6, 2022

YAGOO took to Twitter to announce his presence to his many fans, who expressed excitement for the chance to meet him. Some lucky Ame enthusiasts managed to record a video of YAGOO taking the stage with Smol Ame. Likewise, Kaela Kovalskia expressed her own excitement for meeting him in an Instagram post.

#CRX2022 #hololive He‚Äôs actually here!!! pic.twitter.com/im7HCgKc5z

— üêîüíéüåøButters KFPRyS Stick of Butterüêôü™êüìó (@YahomieButters) August 6, 2022

By the end of the event, YAGOO told his followers that he enjoyed his time at the event. Even if he had no official event to his name, he still put on an incredible show.

I enjoyed! #CRX2022 pic.twitter.com/tHZwrRitaT

— YAGOO / Motoaki Tanigo (@tanigox) August 7, 2022

Photo: Kaela Kovalskia on Instagram

node.description: Slime alien VTuber and Kawa colleague PiaPi Yuefo shares her experience at the recent Nijisanji EN Animate Cafe collaboration.
